content: **language english crochet terminology us** **materials and tools required ** - yarn i use xuefeier chenille yarn with the yarn thickness of 3 0mm you are welcome to use any yarn you prefer just remember to adjust the hook size to match the yarn - hook size 3 0mm - fiberfill - stitch markers - yarn needle - scissors - pins optional **size ** if you use the same yarn as me the finished cat will be 12cm / 4 8inch tall **basic crochet skills required ** the magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet increase decrease should you have any questions regarding this crochet pattern or need assistance please feel free to contact us via the following channels **- direct message - instagram demiwool** *this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy re-selling share translate or distribute all or part of this pattern you may sell finished products from this pattern provided using the hashtag #demiwool to credit us as designer *
